```{r}
webpage <- read_html("https://guide.wisc.edu/faculty/")
xml_find_all(webpage, ".//br") %>% xml_add_sibling("p", "\n")
xml_find_all(webpage, ".//br") %>% xml_remove()
faculty <- html_nodes(webpage, "li")[-(1:12)]
faculty <- html_text(faculty)
table <- data.frame(faculty)
final_table <- str_split_fixed(table$faculty, "\n\n", 4)
colnames(final_table) <- c("name","position","department","degree information")

```
